dct_title_s: Middle East / produced by the Cartographic Division, National Geographic Society ; Richard K. Rogers, assistant chief cartographer. (Verso)
dct_description_sm: "Albers conical equal area projection, standard parallels 15° and 42°." Relief shown by shading and spot heights. "Supplement to National Geographic, September 1978, page 326A, vol. 154, no. 3--Middle East." Includes map of "Eastern Mediterranean," 1:1,775,000, and lists of "Geographical equivalents" and "Abbreviations." Text, color illustrations, and map of "Early civilizations in the Middle East" on verso.
dct_publisher_sm: Washington : The Cartographic Division, National Geographic Society, 1978.
